resources.string:
Hi, my name is Zubair. A self learnt front end web developer. 
A University student graduating soon and engaging 
myself with learning the world. 
A coffee lover fell down in the floor of the things surfing on 
and around screens of variant dimensions. 
An Enthusiastic leader of my peers.
